channel.title: 001Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures VIDEO
channel.description: Bonnie McCaffery demos creative quilting techniques VIDEO
channel.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Bonnie McCaffery demos creative quilting techniques VIDEO
channel.itunes:summary: Bonnie Lyn McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, does video demonstrations of some of the techniques she uses in her quilting and fiber art.
channel.itunes:keywords: quilt, craft, quilting, how to, crafting, video, Bonnie McCaffery

item.title: 071Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Journeys Thru Art Group - Door Challenge
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, talks with members of the Journeys Thru Art Group. After a synchronistic turn of events I discovered a group of quilters in Florida who did a neat challenge about doors. I had been teaching and loved the students. I heard about their smaller group that would be meeting the very next day - and it was my travel day. So paid them a visit and heard all about their quilts. I think you'll enjoy a look into their doors and techniques. Enjoy!
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 071Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Journeys Thru Art Group - Door Challenge
item.itunes:summary: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, talks with members of the Journeys Thru Art Group. After a synchronistic turn of events I discovered a group of quilters in Florida who did a neat challenge about doors. I had been teaching and loved the students. I heard about their smaller group that would be meeting the very next day - and it was my travel day. So paid them a visit and heard all about their quilts. I think you'll enjoy a look into their doors and techniques. Enjoy!
item.itunes:keywords: Bonnie McCaffery, quilt, craft, art, fiberart, quilting, crafting

item.title: 070Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Leslie Tucker Jenison - Gelatin Plate Monoprinting
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Leslie Tucker Jenison - a very creative fiber artist who sees possibilities everywhere. We'll look at a couple of her quilts and fabrics. Then Leslie will do a monoprint demo.
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 070Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Leslie Tucker Jenison - Gelatin Plate Monoprinting
item.itunes:summary: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews interviews Leslie Tucker Jenison - a very creative fiber artist who sees possibilities everywhere. We'll look at a couple of her quilts and fabrics. Then Leslie will do a monoprint demo.
item.itunes:keywords: Bonnie McCaffery, quilt, craft, art, fiberart, quilting, crafting

item.title: 069Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Gail Lawther - Glimpes of New Zealand
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Gail Lawther. On a trip to New Zealand, Gail and her husband saw many things...so many things that Gail decided to do a exhibit to capture them. Her exhibit (and book) is called "Glimpses of New Zealand". The book is available at www.eQuilter.com. Every quilt in the exhibit is in the book along with some great instructions. I think you'll be intrigued by her quilts as well as her demo.
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 069Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Gail Lawther - Glimpes of New Zealand
item.itunes:summary: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Gail Lawther. On a trip to New Zealand, Gail and her husband saw many things...so many things that Gail decided to do a exhibit to capture them. Her exhibit (and book) is called "Glimpses of New Zealand". The book is available at www.eQuilter.com. Every quilt in the exhibit is in the book along with some great instructions. I think you'll be intrigued by her quilts as well as her demo.
item.itunes:keywords: Bonnie McCaffery, quilt, craft, art, fiberart, quilting, crafting

item.title: 068Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Yvonne Brown - Medieval Tiles
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Yvonne Brown. Old tiles are the inspiration for UK artist Yvonne Brown. She does some really cool stuff with a hot soldering iron and some felt.
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 068Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Yvonne Brown - Medieval Tiles
item.itunes:summary: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Yvonne Brown. Old tiles are the inspiration for UK artist Yvonne Brown. She does some really cool stuff with a hot soldering iron and some felt.
item.itunes:keywords: Bonnie McCaffery, quilt, craft, art, fiberart, quilting, crafting

item.title: 067Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Lisa Walton... and a Little Beading
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, talks with Australian quilter Lisa Walton who takes us on a tour of her Jewel Pearce Patterson Scholarship exhibit at the International Quilt Festival in Houston 2011. Then she does a little demo on a beading technique. I bet you laugh at least once....
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 067Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Lisa Walton... and a Little Beading
item.itunes:summary: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, talks with Australian quilter Lisa Walton who takes us on a tour of her Jewel Pearce Patterson Scholarship exhibit at the International Quilt Festival in Houston 2011.
item.itunes:keywords: Bonnie McCaffery, quilt, craft, art, fiberart, quilting, crafting

item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, talks with award winning quilt artist Mariya Waters who shows us some of her secrets of how she does her award winning quilts.

item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, gives us a tour of the biggest quilt show in the US. This year it is absolutely spectacular.

item.title: 064Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Tentmakers in Cairo
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, visits with the Tentmakers of Cairo as the demonstrate their techniques for creating the beautifully hand appliqued designs in cloth.
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 064Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Tentmakers in Cairo
item.itunes:summary: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, visits with the Tentmakers of Cairo as the demonstrate their techniques for creating the beautifully hand appliqued designs in cloth.
item.itunes:keywords: Bonnie McCaffery, quilt, craft, art, fiberart, quilting, crafting

item.title: 063Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Contemporary Embroidery with Karen Ruane
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, talks with Karen Ruane about her hand embroidery! Karen takes simple stitches and creates absolutely beautiful pieces. After we take a look at her work, she will demo a couple really cool techniques with fabric, paper, and embroidery stitches. I found her quite by accident while looking at blogs. Once you watch her, I'm sure you'll want to follow her blog too.
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 063Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Contemporary Embroidery with Karen Ruane
item.itunes:summary: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do,talks with Karen Ruane about her hand embroidery! Karen takes simple stitches and creates absolutely beautiful pieces. After we take a look at her work, she will demo a couple really cool techniques with fabric, paper, and embroidery stitches. I found her quite by accident while looking at blogs. Once you watch her, I'm sure you'll want to follow her blog too.
item.itunes:keywords: Bonnie McCaffery, quilt, craft, art, fiberart, quilting, crafting

item.title: 062Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Festival of Quilts - Birmingham, England Part 2
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, visited the Festival of Quilts in Birmingham, England last month. If the second part of her two part VidCast this month, she introduces you to several representatives of the many exquisite exhibits at the Festival.

item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, visited the Festival of Quilts in Birmingham, England last month. If the first part of her two part VidCast this month, she shows you around the show, seeing lots of quilts, talking with some of the creators and meeting visitors from all around the globe.

item.title: 061Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Fabric Opals with Sue Dennis
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, chats with Australian Sue Dennis about her beautiful quilts depicting natural items and the Australian National gemstone - opals! Then she shows us how she easily creates textures using oil Paintstiks and common items.
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 061Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Fabric Opals with Sue Dennis

item.itunes:keywords: Bonnie McCaffery, quilt, craft, art, fiberart, quilting, crafting

item.title: 060Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Christmas in July with Dawn Farrier
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, sits down with Dawn Farrier, a funky, fun-filled shop owner from California, shows us how she uses recycled items to celebrate Christmas in July!
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com

item.title: 059Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - 2011 Remarkable Symposium - New Zealand
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, had an amazing opportunity to attend the Remarkable Symposium in New Zealand this spring, see the many impressive exhibits and meet many talented artists. Watch to see a whole lot of the quilts that I got to see!
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com

item.title: 058Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Doodles and Life Philosophies
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, demonstrates a few doodles that she incorporates into her Doodle Zen DotZ workshop! Also see a compilation of answers to the intriguing curve-ball question Bonnie often asks when she interviews artists - What is your Life Philosophy?
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 058Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Doodles and Life Philosophies

item.title: 057Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Out on a Limb with Wendy Butler Berns
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, meets up with Jewel Pearce Patterson Scholarship winner Wendy Butler Berns who takes some time to show us the exhibit of student quilts she put together for the 2010 IQA Festival and also demonstrate her Texture Magic technique!
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com

item.title: 056Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - No Rules with Jamie Fingal
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, talks with Jamie Fingal who shares some of her "No Rules" quilts that incorporate all sorts of weird items. She also demonstrates how easy Mistyfuse is to apply and work with.

item.title: 053Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - IQA Houston 2010
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, covers the 2010 International Quilt Festival in Houston, TX. Check out lots of quilts and a few interviews with some of the artists.

item.title: 052Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Tiny Applique with Pat Holly
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Pat Holly. She does the most amazing teeny tiny applique pieces and she'll show us how she does it. She makes it look so easy. You'll get a look at her small masterpieces and you will be amazed.
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 052Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Tiny Applique with Pat Holly
item.itunes:summary: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Pat Holly. She does the most amazing teeny tiny applique pieces and she'll show us how she does it. She makes it look so easy. You'll get a look at her small masterpieces and you will be amazed.
item.itunes:keywords: Bonnie McCaffery, quilt, craft, art, fiberart, quilting, crafting

item.title: 051Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Bling it On with Melody Crust
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Melody Crust. If you've seen Melody Crust at a quilt show, you've seen her Bling - she just sparkles. We'll take a look at some of her collection of Bling, some mini Blinged quilts, and she'll do a demo of just one technique she uses to put Bling on her quilts.
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 051Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Bling it On with Melody Crust.

item.itunes:keywords: Bonnie McCaffery, quilt, craft, art, fiberart, quilting, crafting

item.title: 050Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Art Quilts with Lyric Kinard
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Lyric Kinard. Take a peek at Lyric Kinard's Art + Quilt book. Lyric also does a couple of demos of techniques from the book using some cool stencils, Paintstix and ordinary objects.
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 050Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Art Quilts with Lyric Kinard. Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Lyric Kinard. item.title: 046Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Fabric Embellishment
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Liz Kettle, Ruth Chandler and Heather Thomas. They sit and chat about their book - Fabric Embellishments - and share a few of the gorgeous and innovative techniques including ricing, glass beads and ribbon printing!

item.title: 045Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Dubai UAE International Quilt Show
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, just came back from Dubai, United Arab Emirates, where she judged and taught at the quilt show. There were some very interesting quilts from Iran there as well as many other places. Check out her video coverage of the event!
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com

item.itunes:keywords: Bonnie McCaffery, quilt, craft, art, fiberart, quilting, crafting

item.title: 044Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Nadine Ruggles' Inchie Quilts
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Nadine Ruggles. Imagine little one inch square quilts used to create dimension and texture to a larger quilt. These little mini quilts are addictive.
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 044Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Nadine Ruggles' Inchie Quilts. Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Nadine Ruggles. item.itunes:keywords: Bonnie McCaffery, quilt, craft, art, fiberart, quilting, crafting

item.title: 043Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Karen Kay Buckley
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Karen Kay Buckley. You will be amazed at the award winning quilts Karen Kay Buckley has done. Then she shares a tip of how she achieves her "Perfect Circles." You'll come away believing that you can do perfect circles too.
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 043Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Karen Kay Buckley's Amazing Applique. Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Karen Kay Buckley. You will be amazed at the award winning quilts Karen Kay Buckley has done. Then she shares a tip of how she achieves her "Perfect Circles." You'll come away believing that you can do perfect circles too.
item.itunes:summary: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Karen Kay Buckley.
item.itunes:keywords: Bonnie McCaffery, quilt, craft, art, fiberart, quilting, crafting

item.title: 042Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Susan Brubaker Knapp and Janet Lasher
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Susan Brubaker Knapp and Janet Lasher, who are both very creative fiber artists. I think you'll enjoy seeing their creativity!
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 042Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Susan Brubaker Knapp and Janet Lasher. item.title: 037Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Paula Nadelstern's Kaleidoscope Quilts
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Paula Nadelstern. I have been a fan of Paula almost since the beginning of my quilting. An exhibit of her kaleidoscope quilts is on display at the American Folk Art Museum in New York City until September 12, 2009 and I was lucky enough to be able to see it and talk with Paula about her quilts.
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 037Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Paula Nadelstern's Kaleidoscope Quilts. I have been a fan of Paula almost since the beginning of my quilting. item.itunes:keywords: Bonnie McCaffery, quilt, craft, art, fiberart, quilting, crafting

item.title: 036Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Robbi Joy Eklow
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Robbi Joy Eklow. What a Joy Robbi is? I had a great time talking with Robbi about her quilts and then she showed me how she squares them up. Robbi is always looking for ways to use things that are out there, so its no surprise that she found some great tools at the home improvement store to help her square up her quilts.
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 036Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Robbi Joy Eklow. Tricia was the Jewel Pearce Patterson Scholarship winner for 2007. TWhat a Joy Robbi is? I had a great time talking with Robbi about her quilts and then she showed me how she squares them up. Robbi is always looking for ways to use things that are out there, so its no surprise that she found some great tools at the home improvement store to help her square up her quilts.
item.itunes:summary: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Robbi Joy Eklow
item.itunes:keywords: Bonnie McCaffery, quilt, craft, art, fiberart, quilting, crafting

item.title: 035Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Jewel Pearce Patterson Scholarship Winner 2007 Tricia Spitzmueller
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Tricia Spitzmueller. Tricia was the Jewel Pearce Patterson Scholarship winner for 2007. This scholarship is awarded to one quilt teacher each year and pays for hotel, airfare, and any classes at Quilt Market and Quilt Festival. The following year the scholarship recipient has an exhibit of her work and her students work. We'll take a look at Tricia's exhibit at the 2008 International Quilt Festival.
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 035Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Jewel Pearce Patterson Scholarship Winner 2007 Tricia Spitzmueller. Tricia was the Jewel Pearce Patterson Scholarship winner for 2007. This scholarship is awarded to one quilt teacher each year and pays for hotel, airfare, and any classes at Quilt Market and Quilt Festival. The following year the scholarship recipient has an exhibit of her work and her students work. We'll take a look at Tricia's exhibit at the 2008 International Quilt Festival.
item.itunes:summary: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Jewel Pearce Patterson Scholarship Winner 2007 Tricia Spitzmueller
item.itunes:keywords: Bonnie McCaffery, quilt, craft, art, fiberart, quilting, crafting

item.title: 034Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Russian Quilt Artist Izabella Baykova
item.description: Bonnie McCaffery, author of Portrait Quilts Painted Faces You Can Do, interviews Izabella Baykova. I met Russian Quilt Artist Izabella Baykova at the Festival of Quilts in Birmingham England a couple years ago. I love her quilts. Last year her quilt was one of the top 8 finalists at the Festival of Quilts. I was lucky enough to be able to get a translator so we could hear just how much depth there is to her quilts. I think you'll enjoy it.
item.itunes:author: bonnie@bonniemccaffery.com
item.itunes:subtitle: 034Bonnies Creative Quilting Adventures - Russian Quilt Artist Izabella Baykova.
